Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1060.jpg'}
{1: 'Activity Room - Misono High', 2: 'Track and Field Club Victory Party', 4: 'Night, August 16th - Pleasant and Dry'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Club Member 1', 3: "Why are we at school? Shouldn't we be having this party at a buffet restaurant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Club Member 2', 3: "Who knows? The school probably has something special planned. Maybe there's a surprise in store?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Inside the activity room, Yata sits with her legs crossed on a chair, yawning with an expressionless face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Club Member 2', 3: "Come on, Yata, don't look so gloomy. You're the star of this sports meet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Something feels off about this... These chairs are arranged way too perfectly.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'And why did they have to call us here so late at night...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Club Member 1', 3: "You're right. It feels like we're about to take a listening test or something.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the crowd buzzes with chatter, a sharp screech suddenly pierces through the speakers at the front of the classroom...'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'Please find your respective seats as assigned. Your names are written on the chairs.'}
{3: 'A cold, raspy, emotionless voice creeps through the broadcast system.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Club Member 2', 3: "What's with all this mystery?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Female Club Member 1', 3: "Who's speaking? I don't think I've ever heard this voice before.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Though confused, the track and field club members obediently follow the instructions.'}
{3: 'In moments, every chair in the neat rows is occupied—the number of seats matching the number of people exactly, not one more, not one less.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1062.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{3: 'In the darkened room at the other end of the broadcast system, Kouhei holds the microphone and turns to question the others.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Is Yuka ready?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: "All clear, Chief. She's connected to the mainframe.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Good. Boot up the terminal and initiate remote memory projection.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1060.jpg'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'I would like to thank all of you for your cooperation. Now, let the experiment begin.'}
{3: 'Before Yata can react, an intense headache assaults her brain.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Damn it, it hurts... Why?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The pain feels like glass shards cutting through her skull as Yata rises from her chair.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.6', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Ah, I see... This headache first appeared back then...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'That night, we were called to the club room.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Someone was using us as lab rats for their experiment.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Yata turns around to find the other track team members collapsing to the ground one after another.'}
{3: 'No matter how much Yata shakes them, they remain completely unconscious.'}
{3: 'Soon, bodies lie sprawled across the entire club room, with Yata being the only one left standing.'}
{3: 'Fighting to stay conscious, Yata staggers toward the classroom door through waves of hallucinations...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1062.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: "What's going on!? Why did they all just pass out like that?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: "I don't know...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Look into it, now!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: 'We found the cause—Yuka lost consciousness while she was trying to establish a consciousness connection.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: "The nanomachines in her brain are disrupted—the host system's input signals are going berserk!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: 'The pulse signal output has surged to 300% of planned levels in such a short period of time...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: "And the readings... they're still climbing!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Dammit! Why does that worthless piece of junk have to fail now of all times?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Cut off Yuka's connection to the mainframe now!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: 'Yes, initiating disconnection between the mainframe and the terminal transmitter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "That's it. We're done for today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'The second mass consciousness projection experiment... has failed.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1060.jpg'}
{3: 'Yata grabs a chair and hurls it at the PA speaker mounted on the classroom wall.'}
{3: 'The speaker crashes to the floor, but the headache persists.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "It's not the speaker? What the hell is it, then?!", 4: '1'}
{3: "The pain in Yata's head intensifies until she staggers and collapses to her knees."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Her vision begins to blur as hallucinations nearly eclipse reality.'}
{3: "Like the others, Yata's eyes begin to lose focus, growing distant and vacant."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{3: 'Fading away...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1060.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.6', 5: '0'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You can't fall here, Yata! You're not that helpless kid anymore!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata forces herself forward, groping blindly until her hand touches the wall—'}
{3: 'She instantly realizes what felt off in the hallway—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'The walls here are thicker than the walls on the other floors.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata strikes the wall with her fist, and an echo resonates from within.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "There's a hidden room behind here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Of course, those hallucinations weren't coming from that tiny speaker, but from...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Yata clenches her fist and slams it into the club room's wall with all her might."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory771.jpg'}
{3: 'As the old tiles and steel frame come crashing down...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1059.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1059.jpg'}
{3: 'A hidden chamber reveals itself behind the collapsed wall.'}
{3: 'A secret room behind the club room, its existence never before confirmed.'}
{3: 'In the secret chamber, a dust-covered mechanical behemoth continues its relentless operation.'}
{3: 'Yata approaches the behemoth, plants her feet on the floor, leaps high into the air, and smashes its power cables.'}
{3: "Amid a shower of sparks, the mechanical behemoth's roar dies down, and silence once again fills the room."}
{3: 'In that moment, Yata lets out a breath of relief.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'The hallucinations are gone, and her headache has subsided considerably...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4', 5: '1'}
{3: 'In the dim secret chamber, Yata activates the light device in her palm.'}
{3: 'She rolls her shoulders and carefully circles the machine to examine it from every angle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'A high-performance pulse wave weapon... Looks like it was modified from military hardware.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Yata gently runs her fingers across the machine's surface, making out several lines of embossed text."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Suitable for regional counter-terrorism operations, anti-drone tactics, and coastal defense warfare.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'According to the mission data, the people who experimented on Yuka had Kurono connections. They must have acquired this from Kurono.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Those bastards got creative and fitted it with a remote input device, huh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'They turned this thing into a tool for projecting hallucinations, with innocent students becoming its victims.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'So this is why people just passed out cold at Misono.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'The track club members, myself included, were called here to be unwitting test subjects.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Used like lab rats in some mysterious scheme... Damn it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'If only we had looked into it back then, we could have prevented that tragedy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Gotta keep moving while the hallucinations are weakening. This might be my chance to find Yuka.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1062.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory101.png', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Kouhei, how is she?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'I deeply apologize... but the mass consciousness projection experiment... has failed...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'In one-on-one experiments, we are able to implant nanomachines into the test subject to maintain signal stability...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "But it's simply impossible to implant machines into that many subjects for mass consciousness experiments.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "I believe... perhaps we shouldn't limit ourselves anymore...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Kouhei, repeat my question.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The voice on the other end of the line is calm and emotionless, sending chills down Kouhei's spine."}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Yuka... fell into a coma during the experiment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Vital signs?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Everything's normal... except her heart rate is getting weaker.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Do not proceed recklessly with any further experiments.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Yuka's body can still endure more...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yuka must survive, no matter what. Do I make myself clear?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: '...I get it now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{1: 'Central Region - Hydrangea Island', 2: "Near Scarab's Landing Site", 4: 'Night - Pleasant and Dry'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Discord, the Corrupted are losing their coordination.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Looks like Yata's making progress on her end.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Let's finish them off in one sweep.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Roger.', 4: '2'}
{3: "The pair seize their chance to strike as gaps appear in the enemy's encirclement."}
{3: 'Valeria hurls two high-explosive grenades, causing the Corrupted around them to fall like dominoes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "Let's go. We need to regroup with Yata.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1061.jpg'}
{1: "Derelict Stronghold - Misono's Grand Hall", 2: 'Academic Building - Misono High', 4: 'Night - Pleasant and Dry'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'My power is fading...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Did Yata destroy the Amplifier Pulse Emitter?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Impressive as always, Yata. You've never ceased to excel.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Impressive determination and power, second to none.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the empty lecture hall, Yuka quietly vents her frustrations to no one in particular.'}
{3: 'As she complains, a rustling sound reaches her ears...'}
{3: 'Her crimson eyes scan the surroundings before fixing upon a dark figure emerging from the corner.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Two Corrupted stagger out from between the seats and suddenly lunge at Yuka.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'A puppet breaking free from its strings... Planning to attack your puppeteer?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yuka pulls her massive embroidery scissors from the ground and slices her attacker in half.'}
{3: 'The other Corrupted tries to circle behind Yuka, but before it can strike, invisible threads bind it in place.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "You're nothing but pathetic steel husks that don't even know who you are yourselves...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yuka clenches her thread-wrapped fingers, and the Corrupted is torn to pieces.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Those who cannot dream have no reason to exist.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Surrounded by scattered mechanical parts, Yuka plants her scissors into the ground and leans against them.'}
{3: 'As the night breeze gently stirs her dress, Yuka softly hums a melody from her memories.'}
{3: 'Until footsteps interrupt her peaceful reverie...'}
{2: '????', 3: "Feeling overwhelmed, aren't you? Even with a portion of the Red Tide's power."}
{3: 'Yuka furrows her brow and cautiously scans her surroundings, then relaxes her guard.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "It's you again...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Why are you here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I\'m a bit worried about you since your "heart" has been growing weaker.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Why else would you fail to maintain a few dreams?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: 'If this goes on, even this body of yours... might go with the dreams you created.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "This body wasn't something I willingly received, even if it once belonged to me...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: "But you are special... Instead of having your will devoured by the Red Tide, you strengthened your convictions... That's truly remarkable.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I find you quite interesting, Yuka. That's why I didn't devour you, but instead reshaped your body.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I chewed up that mainframe connected to you and the data stored in it, and force-fed it to you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I went to such lengths for you, but you hate the Red Tide that gave you rebirth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Now, this is what people call ingratitude, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: 'You wanted to weave beautiful illusions and endless paradise with the Red Tide...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I never stood in the way of your dreams. On the contrary, I've always been on your side.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Now that the Memory Amplifier and projection device are damaged, Babylonia will soon take control of this place...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Without control of the island, your dream will never come true.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'What are you suggesting?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: 'The Red Tide can grant you greater power than that machine ever could.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Accept our blessing, and you'll gain full control of the Red Tide.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Forget that old piece of junk—use the Red Tide as your medium to spread illusions instead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Your woven vision will echo through every corner touched by the tide.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Cradle moves close to Yuka and whispers softly in her ear.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Don't you want to become the Prometheus of this new world?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Then achieve your perfect form first, Yuka.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'At the mention of "Prometheus", a distant look flickers across Yuka\'s eyes.'}
{3: 'She remains silent, gazing wistfully at the podium in the center of the lecture hall.'}
{3: 'Yuka walks over unhurriedly and gently caresses the wooden podium.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I remember how Dr. Saotome held quite a few seminars here and presented her hypotheses to everyone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'She believed that there are other beings lying hidden beyond Earth, in the vast cosmos. Their gaze never leaves humanity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'We have to evolve into a higher species through the connection of all human consciousness...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Only by unifying human consciousness can we gain the power to fight them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'For a long time, Dr. Saotome has been waging a mental battle against enemies of her own imagination.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Whenever she mentioned threats from higher dimensions, it only drew laughter from the audience.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yet, she possessed an innate messiah complex.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Even when no one believed in her, she just stuck to her research on "world salvation".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'She saw anyone who hindered her research as enemies of the world and would stop at nothing to deal with them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Such lofty ideals and sense of mission ultimately led her to lose herself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Today, the mysterious enemies she had imagined didn't appear. Instead, the Punishing came.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Earth was no longer solely humanity's home, even though several forces fought like cornered beasts...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Anyhow, no matter who makes up society...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I never believed that human society held any superiority over the Red Tide or the Punishing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'When I was human, I witnessed far too many stories of pain and sorrow.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Everyone is selfish, everyone fails to understand one another—that's the kind of species we are.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I believe humans could never fight the Punishing with the desperate determination that Dr. Saotome hoped for.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Humans will ultimately fall into corruption—they fall because they live.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I deeply respect her, and I will keep my promise to become the Prometheus she envisioned.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'However, I will fulfill her vision in a completely different way—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm going to make everyone abandon their ideals of saving the world, embrace their desires and weaknesses, and then...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Drift aimlessly in this apocalyptic paradise of pleasure and let time slip away between moments and eternity.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I see... Now I understand why your desire runs so deep.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "You're a regressionist among humans... No, more accurately, you're a defeatist.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "But humanity's final curtain will fall sooner or later...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "The Red Tide will paint this planet in beautiful colors, and you... you're someone who has what it takes to appreciate this beauty.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'So? What do you say?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Let the Red Tide gather here, and I shall become one with its flow.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "And then, this island shall mark the beginning of humanity's fall from grace, the genesis of their descent...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Come, enter this fallen Eden.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I'm pleased to see such enlightenment in you, Yuka.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "However, it won't be I who completes this task—it should be you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "As you once said, you understand humans better than I do. You're more suited to become the witness.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory743.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Just as she did before with that Construct from the Forsaken...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1061.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "Cradle takes Yuka's pale hand, and crimson threads seep into her body."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryRedSmokeNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{3: "A scarlet glow seeps through Yuka's school uniform as crimson patterns materialize across her chest."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'What are you doing?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Just a little power, that's all... I'll lend it to you. This way, you can go much further.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Why? Weren't you the one who wanted to explore human civilization?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I can't stay here for much longer. There are more important matters that await me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Where are you going?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'A place far, far away from here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Before I leave, consider this power my parting gift to you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I'm afraid this will be the last time we meet.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryRedSmokeNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "As Cradle releases her grip, color returns to Yuka's previously dim eyes."}
{3: 'In amazement, she presses her hand against her heart, feeling its intense pulsing.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'My heart...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Goodbye, then.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndRed.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndRed.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Hey...!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Yuka can follow, Cradle vanishes without a trace.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'What an... unlikeable person.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Just like me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a soft sigh, Yuka turns and walks away, her steps carrying her across stone stairs blanketed with hydrangeas.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Come forth, tides, gather unto me.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'White dust drifts down from the lecture hall ceiling like falling snow.'}
{3: "As if answering Yuka's call, gentle tremors begin to ripple through her surroundings."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgFightLoading30.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgFightLoading30.jpg'}
{3: 'Not far from here, the Red Tide from the bay area begins to corrupt its way inland...'}
{3: 'In the wake of the tide comes an overwhelming swarm of Hetero-Creatures.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'On the other side of Hydrangea Island, aftershocks continue to ripple outward.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'An earthquake?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "That's not all—Hetero-Creatures from the forest are also surging forward.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'The interference is back... Ngh!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Discord clutches her head in pain, struggling to maintain balance amid the tremors.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Stay calm, take a deep breath, and connect with me like you did last time.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks, Valeria firmly supports Discord by the shoulders to keep her body steady.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Feeling better?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "I can barely move. But there's no time for that... The Red Tide will be here in no time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "The threats we're facing have intensified, and I fear it's the same for Yata, too.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "If things go well for her, communications should be restored soon. If not, we'll have to rush to her aid.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'The plan remains unchanged—regroup with Yata as soon as possible and find high ground to secure our position.', 4: '1'}
